评论详情: My grandson and granddaughter wear these shoes. They stay on their feet and seem comfortable. Easy in and off too!

I would be nice if these were a bit more padded. But I guess since it a bit thinner to move the feet. My granddaughter does like them and she says they fit fine. It is now winter so, we will use again when the weather is a bit warmer. Good for a 3 year old toddler.

I bought these for my sons and daughter to wear for daily use. Bunions run in my family, so we are doing everything we can to prevent our kids from going through the same pain for as long as possible. I really like how well made the shoes are. The soles are think enough to keep their feet safe, but thin enough to allow natural movement. The sides are also lightly padded like a regular shoe, so I don’t have to worry about my kids getting cold feet. They seem to be try to size, but keep in mind that there will be more wiggle room than the average shoe due to the wider toe box. I also appreciate how much more affordable these shoes are compared to the shoes we were getting. If they continue to hold up, we will definitely be return customers as the kids grow.

I ordered two different sizes for my son to try on and the first one was too small, not because it was too short, but the toe box was extremely tight.  The bigger pair we got would have been fine except the right shoe was smaller than the other by at least 1/4”. My son said it was squeezing his foot, but the other one wasn’t. When we held them up to compare them the left one was distinctly larger than the right even though they were both marked as the same size.  I have a pair of saguaro barefoot boots and so I know what a good pair should fit like and I was deeply disappointed in these. I had to return both pairs and I’m ordering saguaro!

These shoes are like giving your toddler superhero powers. My kid went from “wobbly walker” to “parkour professional” overnight. They’re so lightweight, I’m convinced my child thinks he’s actually barefoot—except now he’s invincible against sticks, rocks, and whatever else he insists on stomping on.  The wide toe box is perfect for his little Fred Flintstone feet, and the grip? Let’s just say he’s outmaneuvering me in every game of chase. Bonus: they’re stylish enough that people assume I’m one of those “cool parents” who knows what they’re doing.  Five stars for durability, comfort, and making me question if I’m raising a future ninja. Would recommend to any parent who wants their kid to run faster, jump higher, and occasionally remind you how out of shape you are.

My son had been tearing up to toe of all his tennis shoes and I was searching all over for some wide toe box shoes for him and gave these a try. I love them. He wears them daily, hasn’t worn them out, and the wide toe box is great to not restrict the foot and toes.

评论概述: Hesitant to Order? Here’s What You’re Missing
评论详情: I’m all about a healthy and natural lifestyle. We no longer walk barefoot—it's impossible in the city—but finding shoes for a child that feel natural is entirely doable!  That's why I bought the Barefoot Shoes from KUBUA. Their main feature is that they provide a zero drop, which means no difference in height between the heel and the toe. If you're not familiar with this, here's the info: shoes made with this technology promote natural walking and running.  The sneakers are very lightweight and made from durable yet breathable material. They have a velcro strap, which is essential for kids who struggle with tying shoelaces, but there are laces too—perfect for practice! The inner sole and insole are soft and also breathable. There's plenty of room for toes, and the sneakers fit like a glove. My son said they're "comfy!"  The product page mentions that these shoes are frequently returned, but we had no issues with the size. I think the reason isn't that these shoes are bad, but rather that people either don't know their child's size or order several pairs to try on and return the ones they don't need. So don't worry and go for it if you like them.  My little boy is very active, so it's especially important for us to have shoes that allow him to run freely while giving me peace of mind.
My 6 yr old Grandson loves these shoes. They are his go to shoes for just about anything.
